original_text: Some of them put out fires that were burning very strongly. Some of them got away from people who wanted to kill them with a sword. Other people who were weak became strong. They became powerful to fight wars. They won against foreign armies so that those armies ran away.
korean_text: 불의 세력을 멸하기도 하며 칼날을 피하기도 하며 연약한 가운데서 강하게 되기도 하며 전쟁에 용감하게 되어 이방 사람들의 진을 물리치기도 하며

sentences.original_text: Some of them put out fires
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 이들은 불을 껐으며
매우 강하게 타고 있었던 불을 껐고

sentences.original_text: from people who wanted to kill them with a sword
Other people who were weak became strong
They became powerful to fight wars
so that those armies ran away
